AltName.entry: SHEFFIELD GAIA HOUSE SITTING GROUP - FORMER NAME

Desc.entry: A peer-led meditation group in the Insight Meditation tradition as practised at Gaia House retreat centre in Devon. Meets for meditation, discussion, reflection and sometimes to listen to teacher talks on CDs. Also organises weekend retreats with Insight Meditation teachers 2 or 3 times a year.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Infra red hearing system, Voice synthesiser/visual display in lift, Braille plan of building

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 1st Tues in the month at 7.15pm for 7.30pm start
